review: She has expertise in painless procedures in all surgical u call it RCT or Tooth implant . Since last 15 years I go to her only

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Feeling of hope to get rid of teeth pain realised the moment entered in the clinic.
RC opend. Doctor advised a medicine in case of pain.
Felt no pain afterwards proved Dr Jyoti C. Bhasin the best Consultant Dental Surgeon for me. Besides this, M'am is a genuine human being in my view. Because of the successful treatment received, I celebrate Deepawali & eight years old my daughter's "Khushi's" birthday today very happily.
"Happy Deepawali to Dr Bhasin 'M'am alog with all members of the Tooth & Gum Clinic" !

review:
Had a root canal done today. Despite the placement of the teeth which was at the back, the treatment went off very smoothly and without a hitch. 

Would surely recommend Dr Jyoti to anyone looking for an experienced Dental Doctor who goes to great lengths to put the patient to ease as well as in explaining the issue at hand.
reply_text:
Dear Vandana,

I am happy to know that your RCT was comfortable and painless and Yes, though it was a difficult procedure, half the battle is won when the patient trusts her clinician like you did, completely.

We have know each other for close to 20 years and your words of appreciation mean the world to us.

Team - Tooth and Gum

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,RCT - Single Sitting,Dental Checkup (General),Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review:
It has been 12 years since i am going to Dr.Jyoti C Bhasin. Not once have i thought of going to another dentist. She is effecient and friendly which makes you feel welcome and at ease. She keeps the patient informed of what she is doing and why in layman's language. She takes time to make sure any questions or concerns you may have are answered. She takes her job very seriously. Extremely caring and knowledgeable. I really love my interactions with her. Her office also has very nice atmosphere. Thank you for keeping my smile bright! Wish Dr.Jyoti success in all the areas of improvement and related fields of dentistry. I recommend her always to my friends and family members.
Always a great experience,
Preeti Lata
reply_text:
Dear Preeti Lata,

Thank you for your kind words of appreciation.

To us at Tooth and Gum our patients are not ‚Äòjust patients‚Äô but more like family and friends and hence it is our constant endeavor to do our best and make you as comfortable as possible.

We value your trust in us and hope that we are always able to live up to your expectations.

Team - Tooth and Gum
